survey_responses.What do you think your life might be lik:
What will my life be like in 30 years?
Beyond the fact that today's industries only think about money and nothing else, I think we will start dying and killing people like flies. We are putting very industrial substances into our bodies that are not healthy for us both as food and medicine, this will cause us to have a higher death rate than it was. The population is growing and growing mainly among the Muslim population which will lead to their takeover and wars and chaos of barbarians
survey_responses.What is another dangerous outcome you ca: In my opinion, there is a great danger in the development of AI. Really a doomsday vision like in the movies where the robots develop awareness and take over
survey_responses.What is another positive outcome you can: Of course, as you wrote, there are many positives in the development of AI systems, they save a lot of time and will help the average person do things much more easily, but he must exercise judgment in order to use the system intelligently
